text: Ezɨ Judaba benim isa, 39 plan ifozorozibar na gami. Arazir kam, 5 plan dughiabar na bato.(11:24) Lo 25:1-3, a kamaghɨn mɨgei, Israelba gumazitam fofozim a danɨngsɨva benimɨn a ifozorogh, egh me mengvɨra a ifozorogh mangɨ 40ra tugham. Ezɨ Judaba nɨghnɨsi, me ti paza mega ghua ababanim gafira. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Judaba gumazim fofozim a danɨngsɨva, egh mengvɨra a mɨsogh a ifozorogh mangɨ 39ra tugham.
